description:
Lieutenant Colonel Lieri Bishop and Major Naomi Evans, senior investigators affiliated with the Armed Forces Military Police Investigative Department, will head to Earth from planet Titan to identify the illegal activities a big-shot politician of the Neo Terrors faction is carrying out, which the statesman is doing to reinstate Earth`s power, and the women will indict the politician before a Federal Government session opening on Earth a week later. Meanwhile, Lieutenant Commander Donny Bogan, who is responsible for the transport of those women and is the captain of the battleship Jacinthe, which is used for the transport of VIPs, gathers his subordinates in the operations room. This is to prevent Lieri and Naomi from whistle-blowing and to usher in the women`s hellish brainwashing training......!!
Source: Official website`s episode one page, translated by lf412
